column2: Now it is the independence of Spirit of this New Arabia that I hope the Denver Art Museum can interpret in its photoplay films, and send them on circuits to the Art Museums springing up all over America, where sculpture, architecture, and painting are now constantly sent on circuit. Let that already established convention--the "circuit-exhibition"--be applied to this new art.

column2: And after Denver has shown the way, I devoutly hope that Great City of Los Angeles may follow her example.

column2: Consider, O Great City of Los Angeles, now almost the equal of New York in power and splendor, consider what it would do for the souls of all your film artists if you projected just such a museum as Denver is now projecting.

column2: Your fate is coming toward you.

column2: Denver is halfway between Chicago, with the greatest art institute in the country, and Los Angeles, the natural capital of the photoplay.
column3: Denver is halfway between Chicago, with the greatest art institute in the country, and Los Angeles, the natural capital of the photoplay.

column2: The art museums of America should rule the universities, and the photoplay studios as well.
column3: The art museums of America should rule the universities, and the photoplay studios as well.

column2: In the art museums should be set the final standards of civic life, rather than in any musty libraries or routine classrooms.

column2: And the great weapon of the art museums of all the land should be the hieroglyphic of the future, the truly artistic photoplay.

column2: It is a detailed analysis of the films, first proclaimed in 1915, and never challenged or overthrown, and, for the most part, accepted intact by the photoplay people, and the critics and the theorists, as well.
